Bed Nets

Source: vignettes/BedNets.Rmd
BedNets.Rmd
library(ramp.xds)
mod <- xds_setup(MYZname = "SI")
cov_opts <- list(
  mean = 0.5, 
  F_season = function(t)
    {ifelse(t < 0, 0, (sin(2*pi*(t-365/4) / 365) + 1))}
)
tt = seq(0:730)
with(cov_opts, plot(tt, mean*F_season(tt), type = "l"))

mod <- xds_setup_bednets(mod,
     coverage_name = "func", coverage_opts = cov_opts, 
     effectsizes_name = "lemenach")
tt = seq(0:730)
with(mod$bednets$coverage, plot(tt, mean*F_season(tt), type = "l"))

Every model for

  • VectorControl
    • BedNet
      • DistributeBedNets
      • OwnBedNets
      • UseBedNets
      • BedNetEffects
  • VectorControlEffectSizes
    • BedNetCoverage
    • BedNetEffectSizes

setup_bednet = function(pars, dist_name = basic, distribute = list(), own_name = basic, own = list(), use_name = basic, use = list(), effects_name = basic, effects = list(), coverage_name = basic, coverage = list(), es_name = basic, effect_sizes =list() )
